column2: BabaM, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I suffered from chemo fog and hypothyroidism.I had trouble pulling up the correct words, could not multitask (my usual modus operandi), seemed overwhelmed by much in life.  Cerefolin NAC has helped me overcome these symptoms - I feel like my old self again.

column2: 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: My doctor prescribed this medication (?) after a long bout with a mystery ailment that had me hospitalized for many many tests.  My positive reaction to Cerefolin began very quickly in spite of my skepticism.  The downside is that Cerefolin is quite expensive

column2: Jewels, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I was having great deal of memory problems, with confusion, finding it hard to get through daily task, did not want to communicate with people. I found that at the age of 47 I have had several mini strokes (harden of the arteries). My doctor put me on cerefolin nac. What a miracle drug. I am back to my old self. I never want to return to that place in my life again, it was very frightening. This drug gets a 5 star rating from me. It gave me back my life.

column2: surflamp5, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Extreme itching/rash for 2 days; extreme vomiting for 8 - 10 hours.  One pill for $120 and no fun!

column2: slammlnsam, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: it has helped my memory.I have been on this medication for a little more than a month and I believe my focus and memory has improved.On a lighter note this medication has an oder something that's familiar with all of us. I HOPE IT HELPS ALL OF YOU.

column2: teacher, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I couldn't remember my student's names, special dates, computer logins, and began performing my routine daily habits in odd order or not at all. I became despondent and it scared me.  After only 3 days on this I feel like my old self again.  More energy, able to manage my day with no worries. I thought I was on my way to old age at 52.  A blessing in a blue pill. Has made a real difference in the day to day quality of my life.  It IS a big pill, but so are many vitamin supplements I take.. so no big deal.  No side effects.

column2: CPhTnatural, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I am taking this medication for severe nerve damage to the S1-S2 spinal nerves.  In addition, I suffered a concusion and my memory was affected.  My experience has been extremely positive with drastically lessened nerve pain, increased memory/mental function, and much higher levels of energy.  I would recommend this medication for nerve damage, not only for memory loss.

column2: paranoiddad@sbcglobal.net, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: 42 yr old male, MS type symptoms, severe short term memory loss, word searching, getting lost in office buildings and while driving, mild long term memory loss.          Started Cerefolin NAC about two months ago and am seeing real results with short term memory and ability to get around without getting lost.  No side effects yet, if I have any I will update post.

column2: Capernwray, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I have been taking this medication due to very low B12 numbers.  It has raised and maintained a normal to high level dramatically.

column2: 55-64 Female  (Patient)
column9: I am afraid this drug may influence a person prediposed to diabetes (type II) to get diabetes.

column2: 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: It lowered my homocysteine level.  It also appears to have lowered my familial high cholesterol dramatically from 215 to 181.  I also take other cholesterol-lowering drugs, but the addition of Cerefolin NAC appears to be responsible for this 34-point drop.

column2: 1strength, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: After a serious head injury left me with no short term memory and at a constant loss of words, I thought I was loosing my memory altogether. After 1 month on this medication I notice a very small difference in my memory. I will continue with this treatmentfor at least six months to see if my memory loss stops and or comes back. Keep a journal daily.

column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I took the pill form. They were very big. So the the pill was hard to swallow. I had hoped to get better results it.I have been in the medication for 4 months.

column2: JB, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I take Adderall for ADD. My DR suggested this medication for memory, energy and to off set long term use of Adderall. I've been on C-Nac for 2 mos. I find that I have more energy and my memory has definately improved. That's a big plus!

column2: jcv, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Caregiver)
column9: it was very expensive and my insurance wouldn't approve it and wouldn't pay for it.

column2: 35-44 Male  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: I was having serious memory issues after a series of concussions.  Problems included getting lost on short drives near my house and struggling for words and names.  I was very frightened that I was losing my mind quickly.  After about a month on Cerefolin NAC, my recall of words and names was much better.  I have been on Cerefolin NAC for almost 2 years now and have not felt lost in a familiar place while driving one time.  This product has done wonders for me and my peace of mind.Use is very simple, take one tablet daily, so these people rating "ease of use" as a 1 out of 5 are just not being honest.  I question their honesty on their reactions also, as it really had no side effects for me other than helping me.  It is classified as a "medical food" as opposed to a "drug" because it works to treat deficiencies of naturally occuring substances in the body.  It is highly unlikely that this "brain vitamin" caused a "psychotic reaction"  as one reviewer mentioned.

column2: wezzerfay, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
whistlems, 75 or over Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Caregiver)
column9: More energy, mental alertness, calmness and enjoyment of life.  There was a quick positive reaction to the medicine with absolutely no side effects.It did not take two weeks for relief as expected.

column2: 65-74 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
